# tonemana-catalog

Create or update `tonemana/catalog/` with the seven default Tone & Manner patterns, tokens, and preview HTML.

## Workflow

1) Confirm touchpoints, fixed assets, writing_style baseline, accessibility baseline, and light/dark need.
2) Ensure `catalog_index.yaml` contains the seven default IDs.
3) Ensure all pattern YAML, token JSON/CSS, and preview files exist.
4) Keep user-added patterns and files intact.
5) Summarize generated/updated files and any assumptions.
